bug.author: A7ocin
bug.description: Hello, I just wanted to suggest just a little fix for the documentation. In the Windows installation section, point <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/issues/2>#2</denchmark-link> , it is said to execute: git clone https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/ && git checkout windows but before executing git checkout windows it is necessary to execute cd openpose. Keep up the good work, Nicola
